title: Video Editor
job_overview:
Job Title

**???? Video Editor (Premiere Pro + Canva)**

Company Background

Studio4Motion is a boutique marketing agency based in California. We help professional photographers dramatically increase their productivity using AI-powered workflows. We're building a world-class membership and need a talented video editor to bring our assets to life. Our team is creative, collaborative, and laser-focused on producing exceptional educational content quickly and reliably.

Job Description

This is a full-time role for a creative, detail-driven video editor who wants to grow long-term with a top-tier creative brand. You'll assemble scripted video lessons using our clean structure—voiceovers, screen recordings, Canva slides, and HeyGen avatars—while following naming conventions and branding guidelines. You'll work alongside the founder and content strategist with clear SOPs and direct feedback.

Required Technical Skills & Experience

* 1+ year in professional video editing using **Premiere Pro**
* Experience syncing VO with screen recordings and slide animations
* Comfortable using **Canva** for animated presentations
* Fast, stable **fiber internet (min 25 Mbps; 50+ preferred)** with speedtest screenshot
* Able to return a **paid test edit (30–60 sec)** within 4 hours this weekend

Desired Skills

* Basic VO audio cleanup (compress/EQ)
* Shorts repurposing experience
* Familiarity with AI tools like HeyGen, or interest in learning them

Soft Skills

* Follows instructions and naming conventions precisely
* Strong attention to detail
* Can work quickly without sacrificing quality
* Fast learner and proactive communicator

Basic Tools

* Google Docs, Sheets, and Drive
* Slack (for team comms)
* Notion (for SOPs & assignments)
* Loom (for feedback)

Daily Responsibilities

* Edit and assemble course lessons based on SOP structure
* Upload versions with correct naming: e.g., `6.1_SC_v001.mp4`
* Communicate blockers via Slack or Loom
* Submit a short daily update at end of shift

Work Schedule & Holidays

* Full-time: 40 hours/week
* Flexible hours with 2 hours overlap during LA business time
* 3 vacation + 3 sick leaves after 6 months
* We observe most Filipino holidays (except All Saints & All Souls Day)

Salary & Perks

* $700–$900 USD/month depending on experience
* Paid test edit (this weekend)
* Paid 1-week trial before full hire
* 13th-month pay + career growth path
* Full SOPs and video training provided

Career Potential

Start as our lead video editor and grow into a senior post-production role. You’ll be the core engine behind our course launches, marketing assets, and YouTube production.

How to Apply (Read Carefully)

Submit your application **directly through OnlineJobs.ph**. In your message, please include the following (bullet format only):

* Portfolio link (must include a talking-head and a screen-record project)
* Speedtest screenshot
* Desired hourly rate in USD
* Confirm you can deliver a test edit this weekend
* Attach a screenshot showing your **OnlineJobs.ph ID Proof score** (70 or higher required)

What Happens Next?

1. Receive a test edit assignment (assets + SOP)
2. If selected ? Join paid 1-week trial (starts Monday)
3. Trial successful? ? Welcome to the Studio4Motion team.

Let’s build something world-class. Fast.
– Upgrade to see actual info
